amuse.util.audio
Class AudioFileConversion

java.lang.Object
  amuse.util.audio.AudioFileConversion

public class AudioFileConversion
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods to do various operations on audio files.

Version:
$Id: AudioFileConversion.java 1101 2010-07-01 14:14:50Z vatolkin $
Author:
Clemens Waeltken

Method Detail

convertWithSettings

public static void convertWithSettings(java.io.File musicFile,
                                       java.io.File targetFile)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException

processFile

public static void processFile(java.io.File targetDir,
                               java.io.File musicFile)
                        throws NodeException
This method is used primarily by ExtractorNodeScheduler to prepare the feature extraction of the current music file. The given file will be converted to wave, downsampled and split according to the settings stored in AmusePreferences.

Parameters:
targetDir - The parent folder to place the processed music file into.
musicFile - The music file to process.
Throws:
NodeException

splitWaveFile

public static int splitWaveFile(java.io.File waveFile,
                                int splitSize)
                         throws java.io.IOException
This method splits up a single .wav File into multiple smaller files. The actual limit of each files size is given as a parameter.

Parameters:
waveFile - The .wav to split.
splitSize - The maximum size of each split part in KiloByte.
Returns:
The count of files created.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

convertMp3ToWave

public static void convertMp3ToWave(java.io.File mp3File,
                                    java.io.File outputFile)
                             throws java.io.IOException
This method is used to convert a given .mp3 file to .wav. This method currently uses the javazoom library from www.javazoom.net.

Parameters:
mp3File - The file to convert.
outputFile - The file to write the converted .wav to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown each time the given file is invalid.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        NodeException
This method is used for testing purposes only!

Throws:
java.io.IOException
NodeException
